summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Connections Module - backend APIs and frontend UI. All critical functionality working correctly including influencer table, radar visualization, admin authentication, and data integration.

ui_bugs.issue: Search input field not easily interactive - timeout on fill action
Some column sort buttons not found with current selectors

design_issues.issue: Graph navigation links to /actors/correlation instead of /connections/graph

passed_tests: All 18 backend API endpoints (100% success rate)
Frontend /connections page loads with influencers table
Data integration between frontend and backend
3 test accounts displaying correctly (crypto_whale, alpha_hunter, defi_expert)
